lyrics:
"Nights Like This" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Nights Like This" (feat. Waka Flocka) [Gucci Mane:] Night like this, on a night like this On a night like this? On a night like this On a night like this? On a night like this On a night like this? On a night like this Might get that on a night like this, get car-jacked on a night like this I don't wanna dap, but you know I wanna scrap, and you might get whacked on a night like this On a night like this? Yeah my nigga on a night like this On a night like this... On a night like this a nigga might get killed, whack that nigga, give his ass the whole clip Might send a bitch to attract that nigga. Tease that nigga. Distract that nigga Ran off on the third, get killed on the fifth. Hit him in the head with the damn four-fifth Later in the club he was smoking that piff', shot him in the head he ain't leave no tip Got my lean in the car, (you) can't take no sip. Can't lean, can't walk, can't crawl, can't limp One of them nights when you don't get right, don't fix your face then your ass get killed That's what you get trynna act all stiff, coming up the hill too swift I'll rip one Blood or a crip, (don't) give a damn. I'll hit one. If you don't got a gun, then you better go get one One of them nights when I don't wanna fight, put your hands on me, and I'm ending your life Say it to my left, cause you know it ain't right. Call me Tyronne, cause I know I ain't right I'm the type of nigga that get in a fight, by the end of the night they'll be reading my rights I got the right to shoot your ass on sight, I got the right to put an end to your life If they rob you once, they'll rob you twice. You a pussy ass nigga, you ain't bout that life On a night like this, on a night like this On a night like this, man a nigga killed on a night like this On a night like this, on a night like this On a night like this, I'll kidnap your wife on a night like this Car-jack me a nigga on a night like this, on a night like this Might whack me a nigga on a night like this, on a night like this Put some goons on a nigga, they'll be in your house on a night like this [Waka Flocka:] Uh huh (where he at? where he at?), on a night like this you could lose your life Uh huh (where he at? where he at?), on a night like this you could lose your life Most my niggas rock red, some rock blue. Backdoor a nigga, leave him sick: bird-flu Sell it in the two's, next flip by a coupe. You saying fuck me? Nah pussy nigga, fuck you I'm still the same nigga on the blocks selling rocks, rule number 1 - don't fuck with the cops 50 for a show, 80,000 for the watch. I'm a real game spitter, shawty slicker than a fox With a phone call, boy I could get you hit. My niggas hold pistols like they legit Send them killers at your ass, better hope they miss. You ain't bout that life, you just pop this shit I could see through the mist, shawty snakes in the grass. Dropped out of school, still above my class Real right now, even realer in my past. You don't like what I've become, shawty kiss my ass I'm my own boss, that's why these niggas mad. Phantom ghost, paid it off cash, that's why they mad Hahah, SQUAD, SQUAD, SQUAD, FLOCKA! [Gucci Mane:] On a night like this, on a night like this On a night like this, man a nigga killed on a night like this On a night like this, on a night like this On a night like this, I'll kidnap your wife on a night like this Car-jack me a nigga on a night like this, on a night like this Might whack me a nigga on a night like this, on a night like this Put some goons on a nigga, they'll be in your house on a night like this if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Thanks to Giselle Galle for correcting these lyrics. Writer(s): Davis Radric Delantic, Mays Carlton D AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Diary Of A Trap God" (2013) Decapitated Me Cutters Pablo I Heard Cali Keep It Real Pussy Wet Show A Young Nigga She A Soldier High Power Cowards Recognize Half Nuthin On Ya Nights Like This Choppers All These Bitches Virgin Stash House Fall Back Club Swole Cold Hearted Realest Ever Lived Search
title: Nights Like This Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
